label: Forth Bridge illustrations 1886-1887

metadata.label: Description
metadata.value: 40 black-and-white photographs capturing the construction of the Forth Bridge by Glasgow-based Sir William Arrol & Co. Close-up and distance views of superstructure, cantilevers, lifting platforms and viaduct. Taken at weekly or fortnightly intervals from 1886-1887 by Philip Phillips, son of one of the contractors. Silver gelatin prints.

metadata.label: Full conditions of use
metadata.value: You have permission to make copies of this work under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International Licence unless otherwise stated.
